attributes.action: Allow Driving Test / Lessons to be continued through lockdown for key workers
attributes.additional_details: They should allow the driving to take place during lockdown for key workers because it would mean that key workers would be able to get back and forth from work. Having a licence for key workers would mean they would have less contact with the member of public on public transport and wouldn't need to be getting taxis. It would mean that they would be able to help more in the community if they wanted to do community work for the NHS
attributes.background: For the government to allow any driving test / lessons to still take place during lockdown for key workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
